title: 24 Hours Clock Watch Face
summary: 24 Hours Clock for Android Wear displays military time at analog watch face.
description: 24 Hours Clock for Android Wear displays military time at analog watch face. It isn't watch face meant for weak and fearful ones. Odd hours are marked with numbers and even hours with lines. The watch provides clear mark of time over day full of very important work.  24 Hours Clock indicates month, week day and month day with small text boxes. The watch face strong practical design is meant for brave souls carrying out dangerous jobs 24/7. The settings cover properties of peek card so you can adapt watch face for your needs. You can chose to be interrupted with peek card covering your watch face or subdue all notification, when you conduct your job.

comments: Works well I wish it cold indicate weather, but it is good as a pure 24hr watch face
recentChanges: Watch face was optimised for easier look & fill.
